network.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Client class of our Client/Server infrastructure. This Class is responsible for setting up the connection and starting 2 Threads, one running a ClientSender and the other running a ClientReceiver.
    Author:
    Kenneth Jensen, Floring Bordei, Jaime Lopez, Dave Joe LÃª

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String HOST,
              IDataModel dataModel,
              java.lang.String departmentID)
        Creates a Client connection to the given host and using the given DataModel.
        Parameters:
        HOST - The IP Adress of the server the Client needs to connect to
        dataModel - The DataModel for the Client to use.
